group_1.textRight: Hmm…
So even a tree in the forest could be@leveraged as a weapon…

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.
Especially since in our fighting style,@we don't line ourselves up in formation.
We jump around up in the trees a lot, yeah?
So we use the branches as whips@to beat away our pursuers.
And that's just one example. There's tons@of things you can use 'em for.

group_1.textRight: Perhaps we as Battle Shamanesses can@find more ways to apply them.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, our powers might open up@some new options.

group_1.textRight: For example…let me think…
Trees themselves can bend, not just@their branches, yes?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, and…?

group_1.textRight: If we can bend a tree trunk with our power,@with one of your men balanced upon it…

group_1.textLeft: Yeah?

group_1.textRight: Once loosed, they can use the momentum to fly,@which may allow them to breach castles more easily.
I imagine incorporating something like that gliding@technique your people use to move from tree to tree.
I'm certain you could do something similar!

group_1.textLeft: I don't deny that we can glide around@like flying squirrels,
but you gotta look at things from@a normal person's perspective…
They're all gonna think you're trying to@make us your human cannonballs.

group_1.textRight: I would never propose such a dangerous@notion…!
Chizuru, can I speak with you for a sec?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'm finished training for today,@so I'm good when you are.

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'm finished as well.
I shall be returning home, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, see you around.

group_1.textRight: Yes, you as well.

group_1.textLeft: Alright, what's up?

group_1.textRight: I know you're working with Mizuna, but you@gotta stop bringing her around all the time.

group_1.textLeft: Huh? But why…? I've brought her@here before…

group_1.textRight: But you bring her around way too much,@and too deep into our base.
We can't have the princess listening in@on our secrets…

group_1.textLeft: Are you implying Tsuyu is going to@betray us?

group_1.textRight: Given how the world is, that'll always@be a concern.

group_1.textLeft: You're a gutsy little guy, I'll give you that.

group_1.textRight: What?

group_1.textLeft: Just joking around. I'll be careful.

group_1.textCenter: (Well, it's about time I take a quick nap…)
What's all the fuss about? Dad…?

group_1.textRight: This is no laughing matter.
We've survived for centuries now by keeping@our doors closed…
Now that they've swung wide open, you better@believe our secrets are trickling out.

group_1.textLeft: But Chizuru trusts Tsuyu, does she not?
If there's something Battle Shamanesses can only@communicate with each other, I won't stop them.

group_1.textRight: Dammit, you always go soft on@your daughter…!

group_1.textLeft: Even so, it's a good idea, no?

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: We'll have Chizuru marry one of@Mizuna's kin.
The deeper our connection, the less@we have to fear.

group_1.textRight: Haha. An interesting notion…
